tool.name: Extract AnnData from MuData

configfiles.configfile: import scanpy as sc import muon as mu import anndata mdata = mu.read_h5mu('$mudata_input') first_mod_out = mdata.mod['$first_modality'] second_mod_out = mdata.mod['$second_modality'] first_mod_out.write("first_mod.h5ad") second_mod_out.write("second_mod.h5ad")

tool.help:
**What it does** This tool extracts and then returns each modality within a MuData object stored in a multimodal matrix file (.h5mu) as a separate AnnData object in a h5ad file.
NOTE: This tool currently supports only the extraction of exactly 2 modalities from a MuData object.
